name: Classified Olx clone
short_description: The Olx software is the most widely used marketplace software intended to transact online a wide range of products and services globally. Inspired by the popularity of the software, Kolkata based IT firm developed a clone software of Olx popularly referred to as Olx clone. The clone has several features that are different from the parent product and that aims at lending a certain level of uniqueness to the script. And often the company regularly conducts R&D to improvise upon the existing product, to add new features and properties to it, making it competitive in the global market.
summary: The Olx is a popular tool that creates an online marketplace of goods
